/* App.svelte generated by Svelte v4.2.20 */
import {
	SvelteComponent,
	add_render_callback,
	append,
	detach,
	element,
	init,
	insert,
	listen,
	noop,
	safe_not_equal,
	select_option,
	select_value,
	set_input_value
} from "svelte/internal";

import "svelte/internal/disclose-version";

function create_fragment(ctx) {
	let select;
	let option;
	let select_disabled_value;
	let mounted;
	let dispose;

	return {
		c() {
			select = element("select");
			option = element("option");
			option.textContent = "1";
			option.__value = "1";
			set_input_value(option, option.__value);
			select.disabled = select_disabled_value = /*data*/ ctx[0].locked;
			if (/*details*/ ctx[1].country === void 0) add_render_callback(() => /*select_change_handler*/ ctx[2].call(select));
		},
		m(target, anchor) {
			insert(target, select, anchor);
			append(select, option);
			select_option(select, /*details*/ ctx[1].country, true);

			if (!mounted) {
				dispose = listen(select, "change", /*select_change_handler*/ ctx[2]);
				mounted = true;
			}
		},
		p(ctx, [dirty]) {
			if (dirty & /*data*/ 1 && select_disabled_value !== (select_disabled_value = /*data*/ ctx[0].locked)) {
				select.disabled = select_disabled_value;
			}

			if (dirty & /*details*/ 2) {
				select_option(select, /*details*/ ctx[1].country);
			}
		},
		i: noop,
		o: noop,
		d(detaching) {
			if (detaching) {
				detach(select);
			}

			mounted = false;
			dispose();
		}
	};
}

function instance($$self, $$props, $$invalidate) {
	let data;
	let details;
	const default_details = { country: "" };

	function select_change_handler() {
		details.country = select_value(this);
		($$invalidate(1, details), $$invalidate(0, data));
	}

	$$self.$$.update = () => {
		if ($$self.$$.dirty & /*data*/ 1) {
			$: $$invalidate(1, details = data.details ?? default_details);
		}
	};

	$: $$invalidate(0, data = { locked: false, details: null });
	return [data, details, select_change_handler];
}

class App extends SvelteComponent {
	constructor(options) {
		super();
		init(this, options, instance, create_fragment, safe_not_equal, {});
	}
}

export default App;
